recipes.caption: Fried Rice
recipes.description: Fried rice is a dish of cooked rice that has been stir-fried in a wok or a frying pan and is usually mixed with other ingredients such as eggs, vegetables, ...

recipes.caption: Biriyani
recipes.description: Biryani  is a mixed rice dish originating among the Muslims of South Asia. It is made with rice, some type of meat (chicken, beef, goat, lamb, prawn, or fish) and spices.

recipes.caption: Chilli Chicken
recipes.description: Chilli chicken is a popular Indo-chinese appetizer made by tossing fried chicken in spicy hot chilli sauce. Learn to make the best at home.

recipes.caption: Fish Curry
recipes.description: This Fish Curry is satisfying, nutritious and packed with a burst of Indian flavors. Onions, tomatoes, spices & herbs enrich the taste

recipes.caption: Kuzhimanthi
